This could be simply a function instead of a templated class:

  static bool TensorOpMathEnabled() {
    static bool is_enabled = [] {
      bool ret;
      tensorflow::ReadBoolFromEnvVar("TF_ENABLE_TENSOR_OP_MATH", /*default=*/true, &ret);
      return ret;
    }();
    return is_enabled;
  }
